name: (not) Alone on the Moon
description:
Stranded in the moon, as an astronaut, you realized that you were not alone on the moon. Fight evil yellow beans to survive with your trusty laser gun that you accidently brought to your trip to the moon.

Controls are WASD, left click to shoot, right click to shoot, and space bar to jump.

Hi there, this is my submission for the game jam. It is not perfect and I am not really proud of it since it is the second game that I made and it took me around only 20 hours to make cos I got Uni going on but I am excited to begin my journey as a game developer. I'm planning to polish this game more and make everything better since I didn't have much time to work on it to begin with. For the unity assets I used the Standard Unity Asset, Extra Sybox Assets, MapMaker2, and Scifi-Handgun by Life Hacker.
